title.title: BALI TREKKING AND ATV RIDE TOUR
title.text: BALI TREKKING AND ATV RIDE TOUR
title.html: BALI TREKKING AND ATV RIDE TOUR

tagline.title: BALI TREKKING AND ATV RIDE TOUR PACKAGES IS DOUBLE ACTIVITIES TO ENJOY MOUNT BATUR SUNRISE TREKKING TOUR AND THEN CONTINUE TO DO THE ATV RIDE TOURS
tagline.text: BALI TREKKING AND ATV RIDE TOUR PACKAGES IS DOUBLE ACTIVITIES TO ENJOY MOUNT BATUR SUNRISE TREKKING TOUR AND THEN CONTINUE TO DO THE ATV RIDE TOURS
tagline.html: BALI TREKKING AND ATV RIDE TOUR PACKAGES IS DOUBLE ACTIVITIES TO ENJOY MOUNT BATUR SUNRISE TREKKING TOUR AND THEN CONTINUE TO DO THE ATV RIDE TOURS

description.text: Bali Trekking and ATV Ride Tour is an Bali Double Activities Tour Packages we combine to make great packages by doing the Mount Batur Sunrise Trekking Tour and then continue to do the ATV Ride Tour to enjoy the beatan track we offer. Great two activities we combine in one day, firstly you will enjoy to trekking the Mount Batur and see the amazing view of Volcano and the sunrise, is impressive moment by spend time in Mount Batur mountain to see the sunrise from the top, our trekking guide will offer you with breakfast (bread and egg). Will take around 2 hours from the start point to get to the top and another 2 hours from the top of mountain to get to finish point. After the trekking finish, our driver will excort you to the ATV ride place where you can enjoy the 1 hours riding ATV Bike to see the amazing view of rice paddy and see the daily social activities life in the village. During the ATV you can stop fro having taking picture as many as you like. After ATV Ride finish you will enjoy the delicious lunch with Indonesian food and after lunch our Bali Tour Driver will escort you back to your hotel with bring an amazing memory. The Bali Trekking and ATV Ride Tour is more amazing with our professional Bali Tour Driver and the Private car with good A/C condition.

title.title: Bali Mount Batur Sunrise Trekking Tour | Bali Trekking and ATV Ride Tour Packages
title.text: Bali Mount Batur Sunrise Trekking Tour
title.html: Bali Mount Batur Sunrise Trekking Tour

image.title: Bali Mount Batur Sunrise Trekking Tour | Bali Trekking and ATV Ride Tour | Bali Golden Tour

description.text: Bali Mount Batur Sunrise Trekking Tour is best hiking adventure to see the sunrise from the top of the mountain. Mount Batur is located in Batur village, Kintamani District, Bali, Indonesia. Mount Batur (Gunung Batur) is 1717 m above sea level can be summited by physically fit hikers in around 2 hours. Mount Batur Bali is an active volcano that draws tourists in with both beauty and promise of spectacular trekking tours. We offers climb Mount Batur Bali to enjoy an unforgettable sunrise from the top of an active volcano. Spectacular scenery and the vibration of the sacred earth filling your mind and soul as u served by tasty morning breakfast cooked by the steam of the active volcano.

title.title: Bali ATV Ride Tour | Bali Trekking and ATV Ride Tour Packages

image.title: Bali ATV Ride Tour | Bali Trekking and ATV Ride Tour | Bali Golden Tour

description.text: Bali ATV Ride Tour Packages is a Journey to explore the hidden beauty of Bali Islands by riding ATV Bike and assist by professional Bali ATV Ride tour. The journey will explore the beauty of the rice field and see the amazing view of the rice, you can stop here for take picture as much as you want and then continue to passed the local village and see the social activities life at the village. Is great experience vy explore Bali islands in the way you never try before. Try the beat the beatean track we offer during this trip and this is not a speeding tour, it just only sightseeing tour by riding an ATV bike.

button.title: Bali ATV Ride Tour | Bali Trekking and ATV Ride Tour Packages

price.title: Bali Trekking and ATV Ride Tour Price :
price.content:
Bali Trekking and ATV Ride Tour Price :

  • 1 Person : IDR 1,800,000 (Solo Traveler)
  • 2 Person : IDR 1,250,000/person
  • 3 Person : IDR 1,000,000/person
  • 4 Person : IDR 950,000/person
  • 5 Person or More : IDR 925,000/person

Note :

  • Get special price for group booking

Bali Trekking and ATV Ride Tour Price Included :

  • Private Car with Clean, Comfortable and Good A/C condition
  • Mineral Water
  • Safety and Well Maintenance Equipment's
  • ATV Ride Equipment : helmet
  • Trekking Equipment : flashlight
  • Professional Trekking and ATV Ride Tour Guide
  • Lite Breakfast (Bread and Egg)
  • Lunch buffet Indonesian Food
  • Insurance Coverage

itinerary.title: Bali Trekking and ATV Ride Tour Itinerary :

content.event: Enjoy Mount Batur Sunrise Trekking Tour
Trekking Finish and Continue the tour
ATV Ride Tour Finish and continue the tour
Lunch Finish and Back to hotel

inclusion:
Seminyak, Legian, Kuta, Nusa Dua, Jimbaran, Pecatu, Sanur, Ubud, Canggu, Denpasar, Benoa Harbour, Airport
Please contact us for pick up in different area

• Payment is Cash Payment
  • Payment is on the day itself with our driver
  • Payment with other currency will convert based on daily exchange rate

• The price already include with 21% Government tax and Services
  • Get special price for group booking
  • The tour is Private Tours, means there is no other participant, just only you and your companion
  • The Tour will assist by English Speaking Tours Driver
  • Tour Guide can be requested, contact us if you want to request Tour Guide during the trip
  • Time and Tourism site is subject to change based on your request.
  • Use contact form provide to send us message, asking information or make tour booking request.
